definition: one of the flat round pieces used in playing the game of checkers, to variegate with different colors, shades, or patterns
details:
noun
- one of the flat round pieces used in playing the game of checkers
= synonyms: chequer
- one who checks the correctness of something
- an attendant who checks coats or baggage
verb
- to variegate with different colors, shades, or patterns
= synonyms: chequer
- to mark into squares or draw squares on
= synonyms: chequer
